page.title: 09Population and Employment
page.content: {Estimated Population }for the Rusper District in 1986 is 1,455. Information obtained from the children at Rusper school about the work patterns of their parents.( They are a good cross section of the community.) Work on the land... e.g.farming,but do not own farm 10% Work in the village...e.g. shop 5% { This 15% either live at their place { of work or walk - own car for leisure Commute to Horsham..e.g.offce,bank 12% Commute to Crawley................ 30% { All travel by car.} Commute to Dorking, Reigate,etc... 30% { Travel by car or leave car at Faygate { Station then continue by rail. Work at Gatwick Airport........... 5% { Travel by car. Commute to London................. 8% { Travel by car to Faygate or Horsham {Station then continue by rail.}
